problem_text_cn: 如图,王红同学跳起来把一个排球打在离她3m远的地上,然后反弹碰到墙上,如果她跳起来击球时的高度是1.8m,排球落地点离墙的距离是6m,假设球一直沿直线运动,球能碰到墙面离地()米的地方．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, Wang Hong jumped up and hit a volleyball on the ground N_0 away from her, and then bounced to hit the wall. If she jumped up and hit the ball at a height of N_1, the distance between the volleyball landing place and the wall was N_2, suppose The ball has been moving in a straight line, the ball can touch the wall () above the ground
raw_answer:
解:如图,∵CE是排球反弹的路线,∴∠ACB=∠ECD,
又∵∠ABC=∠EDC=90°,∴△ABC∽△EDC,∴\frac{AB}{ED}=\frac{BC}{CD},
即\frac{1.8}{ED}=\frac{3}{6},
解得ED=3.6m．
故选:C．
